attributes.action: Theresa May should quit as prime minister with immediate effect.
attributes.additional_details: Threse May should quit as prime minister with immediate effect and hold a general election.
attributes.background: The prime minister of the UK has failed miserably to secure a brexit deal on more than one occasion. This is humiliating for the British public and the prime minister is to blame. Not just losing MPs from her team she has also lost the trust the British public. Article 50 needs to be revoked ASAP.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. That includes asking for people to resign or be sacked. 

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could search for and sign a petition about that:

https://petition.parliament.uk/

If you would like a general election, you might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:

Have another general election  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480

Hold a General Election in April 2019.  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235071
